items.name: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.name: The Shawshank Redemption
items.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.name: Beast
items.description: في إطار من المغامرات والرعب، يجد أب وابنتيه المراهقتين أنفسهم مطاردين من قبل أسد مفترس عازم على إثبات أن غابات السافانا لا تمتلك أي مخلوق آخر بشراسته.

items.name: Alpha
items.description: A young man struggles to return home after being separated from his tribe during a buffalo hunt. He finds a similarly lost wolf companion and starts a ...

items.name: venom
items.description: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.
